alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:02AM CDT until April 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 24.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Friday was 24.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 19.1 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 24.1 Fri 8 am CDT 23.3 21.9 20.7 &&
